title: The Nonsensical Disparagement of Jim Halpert, Regions Restaurant, The Situation, and Samantha Bee
description:
We are building the perfect restaurant with all the best meals from each restaurant. The NBA might be adding a mid-season tournament but the NHL needs this more than anything. Barstool Pond Hockey is coming February 2020.Â In Defense of Jim Halpert. Voicemails: AirBnB Murder, Bringing fake girlfriend on vacation, Condiments would you rather, Lady Mailman. Mike "The Situation" Sorrentino is out of jail and dropping knowledge. Samantha Bee stops by to chat about Full Frontal and her new election app Totally Unrigged Primary.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
